transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan Reddy sir.
Customer: Boliye boliye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello hello boliye.
Customer: Hello namaskar sir kaise hain?
Executive: Thik hai achche hain.
Customer: Haan kahan hai sir system pe hai ya mobile pe hai sir?
Executive: Main laptop mein to hai abhi kya hai mere ko nahi samajh mein aata yaar aap log.
Customer: Main bata raha hun main bata raha hun main bata raha hun main bata raha hun ab ab wo bas thoda.
Executive: Aap to apna kaam nipatne ki koshish karte hain lekin hamara to hamara kaam to hoga hi nahi na.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Main karwa raha hun aap.
Executive: Aap tension mat lijiye main kaam karwa raha hun sir.
Executive: Aap to sirf yahi bolege hum humko kaam pe lagaoge isse fayda kya hai uska aapke side se hoga to karo nahi to mat karo baat khatam.
Customer: Nahi nahi aapko kaam dekhiye jo cheeze aapke side se humko kaam pe laga ke fayda kya hai usme.
Customer: Humko to hum to seedha bolte hain ki humko buylead nahi aa rahe aap check karke usme correction kar sakte hain to kar do.
Customer: Bilkul wo buylead na aane ka karan hi wo jo hamare side se correction nahi ho pa raha wo bas aapko chota sa karya hai sir bada koi karya nahi hai sir itna nahi karna hai.
Executive: To thik hai sir main simple kiya main aapka side main open karke boliye ji boliye.
Customer: Thik hai setting pe click kariye sir sabse neeche wala tab hoga sir.
Customer: Haan okay.
Customer: Ho gaya sir.
Customer: Thik hai ab setting pe sabse last dekhiye sir na wahan pe buylead preference likha hua hai sir sabse upar top mein.
Executive: Do minute.
Customer: Buylead preference pe click kiya hoga to preferred location aa raha hoga sir uske baad not preferred location aa raha hoga uske neeche se ha sir do minute.


Executive: Haan boliye aage boliye.
Customer: Haan category preference pe click kariye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Setting pe click kar diya na sir.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Upar upar top pe hai notification account setting PNS call setting buylead preference buylead preference pe click kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Thik hai neeche scroll karenge pehle city aa raha hoga uske baad not preferred city aa raha hoga uske neeche ek likha hoga sir category preference sabse neeche.
Customer: Category preference.
Customer: Sabse neeche mein hoga sir.
Executive: Haan barabar hai haan.
Customer: Hmm us pe click kariye.
Customer: Ho gaya sir.
Executive: Hmm okay haan.
Customer: Ab pehla pehla column bana hai based on your product jisme 12 product hai sir thik hai.
Customer: Uske baad column hai sir based on your buylead consumption jisme koi nahi hai sir thik hai ek last mein column hai sir teesra wala column not preferred category 10 hai sir thik hai na sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ab not preferred category mein kya ho raha hai sir ki isme jo kuch kuch category hai na jaise apni hai sir industrial swimming pool construction residential swimming pool construction swimming pool construction iske andar marks hai sir usko hatane hai ek bar aap check kijiye na pehla glass mosaic tiles hai sir.
Executive: Ye sahi hai.
Customer: Ye sahi hai usko to usko to rehne dijiye haan thik thik usko rehne dijiye swimming pool chahiye aapko to usko hataiye sir wahan se wo not preferred mein laga hai wahan se cross karke confirm kariye yahi cheez to dikkat aa rahi hai main sir wo by mistake ho gaya hoga kabhi aur neeche dekhiye inflatable inflatable swimming pool chahiye sir ya nahi chahiye nahi chahiye haan wo wo nahi chahiye hoga wo rehne dijiye swimming pool chemical bhi nahi chahiye swimming pool construction chahiye na achcha chemical to hataiye sir fir wahan se.
Executive: Chahiye.
Customer: Swimming pool uske baad construction hai sir swimming pool construction.
Customer: Usko bhi hataiye sir.
Customer: Iske baad sir swimming pool mats aa raha hai sir wo chahiye ya nahi chahiye sir.
Executive: Nahi chahiye wo rehne dijiye nahi chahiye.
Customer: Thik hai uske baad underwater swimming pool aa raha hai.
Customer: Nahi chahiye thik hai.
Executive: Underwater light chahiye.
Customer: Swimming pool tiles bhi nahi chahiye heat swimming pool bhi nahi chahiye hai na sir.
Customer: Haan ye sab nahi chahiye thik hai haan haan barabar ye sab nahi chahiye.
Customer: Ab ab ye ho kya raha tha na sir hum yahan se requirement bhej rahe the thik hai parantu na sir aapne apne account pe wo not preferred category mein add ho gaya tha to wo account le hi nahi pa raha tha sir wo ek prakar se resistance laga diya tha sir hai na to wahi main us din bhi call kar raha tha aaj bhi kar raha tha ab na sir isse sambandhit jitni bhi category se sambandhit generate hogi lead na aapke account pe directly sir show hogi sir thik hai na sir bas yahi chota sa kaam tha ye hamare side se access nahi hota hai sir ye 24 hour ke andar up to date hoke aapko milne lagegi thik hai sir.
Executive: Achcha hai thank you thank you.
Customer: Haan Reddy sir ek mera feedback ek bar ek feedback jayega aapko whatsapp mail pe ki Manish ji ne aapke account sambandh mein aapko call karke support kiya isse aap satisfied hai ki nahi ek bar apna bahumul feedback dijiyega thik hai sir.
Executive: Chalega thik hai.
Customer: Okay okay sir mera main number Reddy sir aapko apna share kiya hai 7011 whatsapp pe.
Executive: Chalega abhi aap wo thik hai.
Customer: Us pe aap mujhe connect nahi kal us din kiya tha 7011967485 aapke whatsapp pe share kiya us pe aap mujhe.
Executive: Ek minute.
Customer: Ek minute ruk jaaiye Reddy sir.
Customer: Aapka aapka last mein whatsapp number kya hai sir?
Customer: Last ke 8879240 887924.
Customer: 87924 right.
Customer: Dekhiye maine ek bar hi us pe message pe type karke maine hi likh diya hai sir thik hai wo number save kar lijiye aur koi bhi usme update changes honge na mere number pe call kariyega main turant karwa dunga thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai okay.
Customer: Okay sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not receiving buyleads.

- Wants to resolve the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive identified the issue in settings.

- Guided customer to remove unwanted categories.

- Informed the customer about the resolution.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive feedback form on WhatsApp.

- Customer to share feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, settings, whatsapp
